description.english: Win a game against an all-CPU team
Get 3 natural Hat Tricks in a quarter against the CPU

Beat challenge level 10
Can you get the fans to do "The Wave"?

Deflect 100 attacks using turbo
Play for a total of 55 minutes and 55 seconds
Can you break the scoreboard?
